input.sentences: why did men always talk about the price of gas she wondered .
her husband would drive miles out of the way just to save a few pennies and it annoyed her .
she put it out of her mind and decided to think about the class reunion .
she looked forward to seeing all her old friends .
once they got there she was n't shocked when the men began discussing the price of gasoline .
output.sentences: We talked about what we wondered what the price was.
We saved a few pennies every mile.
We decided we wouldn't mind the reunion.
We were shocked at the price of gasoline.
